StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: proc_markcard_cteacher
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE proc_markcard_cteacher ( p_school_code IN VARCHAR2, p_batch_no IN DATE, p_class_code IN VARCHAR2, p_stream_code IN VARCHAR2, p_section_code IN VARCHAR2, p_term_code IN VARCHAR2, p_cteacher_digital IN OUT VARCHAR2, p_class_teacher_name IN OUT VARCHAR2 ) AS CURSOR cur_class_teacher ( pp_school_code VARCHAR2, pp_batch_no DATE, pp_class_code VARCHAR2, pp_stream_code VARCHAR2, pp_section_code VARCHAR2, pp_term_code VARCHAR2 ) IS SELECT class_teacher_id, class_teacher_name FROM mv_class_teacher WHERE school_code = pp_school_code AND batch_no# = pp_batch_no AND class_code = pp_class_code AND stream_code = pp_stream_code AND section_code = pp_section_code AND term_code = pp_term_code; BEGIN OPEN cur_class_teacher(pp_school_code => p_school_code, pp_batch_no => p_batch_no, pp_class_code => p_class_code, pp_stream_code => p_stream_code, pp_section_code => p_section_code, pp_term_code => p_term_code); FETCH cur_class_teacher INTO p_cteacher_digital, p_class_teacher_name; CLOSE cur_class_teacher; END;
